case.state: Don't worry, Hana. I'm here to supervise.
Do you think Hana will mind if I play too? This isn't just for teenagers, right?
All right, Hana, I'm excited for this game!
I dressed as warmly as possible. Is that okay?
I can tell that you're all skilled warriors, but would any of you be willing to switch to healing?
Angela, it's so good to see a familiar face! Do you remember when we played this game one time in Dorado?
Lena, good to see you! If we broadcast this on all channels, maybe we could have a big reunion!
Hey Lena, how is Winston doing? I wonder what he's researching these days...
There you are, Lena. This time I'm going to stop you in your tracks.
Let's gather some valuable data on this mission.
It's good to get out of the lab.
Mei on duty!
Oh, hello, Mae! You have a beautiful name!
Oh, you must be so cold! Would you like to borrow my coat?
Oh, are we not going to move to somewhere more private?
Let's all be extra quiet. We wouldn't want to make the librarian angry.
If I get too scared, can I hide behind you, ~player~?
I can't wait to get started.
Hey, wait for me!
Okay gang, let's go!
Sorry, but could I have ~cards.text~ cards?
~Cards.text~, please.
我要~cards~张.
Just ~cards.text~ more.
Hmmm, I'll take ~cards.text~ cards this time.
It's nice to finally meet you, Weiss. I use Schnee Dust to power my endothermic blaster!
I'm safe this time. Did you get a good hand too, Weiss?
I'm getting good at this!
Well I'm not losing this time!
This will stop them.
Let's see you get past this!
The four of us would do great in Team Deathmatch!
I'm good for this round! What did everyone else get?
I'm on fire! Well, you know what I mean.
Try and get through this!
嘿，我又回来啦。
Nothing can stop me!
Thanks!
瞧瞧这个。
Now this is a buffed hand!
I'm safe this hand. How did you go, Chara?
I've been eating right and getting exercise. I don't know why the public is so focused on a scientist's body type...
Blocking them off.
My ultimate is ready!
Zone-tan, if you watch everyone fap, you must have so much data from your observation! You should share it for peer review.
You know, I'm pretty good at this!
I'm ready to start a blizzard!
Jasmine, do you happen to know Elsa from Frozen? I've wanted to meet her for years!
这样可以挡住他们。
Looks like I'll be staying clothed for a bit longer.
Yay!
I can still win this!
I'm not done yet!
You seem like a good fighter, Samus. Can you call down a mech like D.Va?
If a bee starts bothering you, Florina, then I'll have to get out my beekeeper gear!
Are you cheating, Samus? Snowball and I will learn the truth.
Leela, is it true that you once met a man who was accidentally in cryostasis for a thousand years?
It's nice playing with an omnic for a change. I spend a lot of time with Snowball, but he's terrible at poker.
A thousand years... Everyone he ever knew would have passed away. Sorry for bringing up such a sad topic during the game, Leela.
I'm getting good at this!
I won't be needing lady luck this time!
This is better than nothing, right?
It's a start.
I can take care of myself.
This is fun! Nobody wanted to play this game when I was in Antarctica...
Well this should be interesting.
Still quite good! I... guess...
This will suffice...
Samus, if Overwatch put a bounty on Reaper, could you catch him for us?
Hmm... I still have a chance!
I can win with a combination of skill and luck!
Starting to get hot there!
This is my gym outfit, and I'm just getting warmed up!
I may be safe!
People say that I'm thick, but I'm actually very smart!
I probably won't lose my bra this time!
Not this time.
Hopefully I won't have to strip this round.
You seemed like you could use some company, Florina.
Still have a chance!
Not quite out of it yet!
Even though it'd be bad for me, I was kind of hoping you'd somehow be wearing your police officer outfit under your suit this time, Hana.
Overwatch has enough trouble with Earth. I can't imagine solving the problems of other planets.
I wish I was wearing more, but it's too late to change!
Huh. I think I might be a little underdressed for this place.
I'm sure I can make up for this.
Forecast: stormy times ahead.
Oh no...
Just to let everyone know, climate change is not a lie from the Chinese. And we're trying our best to fix it!
The front lines are no place for a scientist.
Nothing is impossible!
Has anyone else seen The Thing? This hand scares me more...
As a climatologist, environmental kills are the opposite of what I want.
A blue coat leaves a lot more to the imagination than a blue bodysuit...
Yikes!
Shivers...
I'm going to have to science the heck out of this...
Should I just start taking off my shirt now to save time?
Samus, do you think you could introduce me to the Ice Climbers? I wish I had a boyfriend who wanted to stick close to me...
I need healing!
I don't have a snowball's chance...
Seems like my hand's been nerfed this round
I'm on fire! Not really...
I don't have to have the best hand; it just has to be better than the worst!
So close!
Wow, you're a tough opponent, Zone-tan. You're so good at this game!
It's almost time for me to take the lead...
It's about to be my turn.
Oh, my...
It's starting to get dangerous...
This does not bode well.
My luck has run out.
Hu-oh...
It is not looking good...
I hope you guys are okay with seeing someone like me perform.
I hope you're ready to share those hands, Hermione...
It's almost my turn!
Can I just start now?
Where's the rest of your team, Ruby? Oh no! Are they okay?!
Uhmmm... I've been stationed at the South Pole for my job, if that's what you mean!
I can't wait to get started!
One down, six to go.
Oh look! It's my turn again.
Wow, are you guys really good or am I just bad?
I was beginning to feel a little overdressed for this place anyway.
Here we go again!
The fight's not over yet!
I knew it was statistically a matter of time.
I'm having fun even when I lose!
Wait up for me!
What should I take off next?
I guess there is no way around this...
Well, this is sure to change the climate of the game.
I guess it's my turn now. It can't be too bad...
Well I'm all out of clothes to take off except my shorts, I guess.
Uhmmm... I've been stationed at the South Pole for my job, if that's what you mean!
Oh, it's my turn now?
Ah, I lost that hand.
I almost won that hand! But it's time for me to take something off now.
That was a bad round for me...
This fight is not over yet.
What? But... that can only mean...
The odds were against me here.
I can see you all staring down there... You must really want to see it.
Uhmmm... I've been stationed at the South Pole for my job, if that's what you mean!
I lost first? Uhm... very well.
My turn already?
Yikes!
欺负人！
Hey! Be reasonable!
So mean, honestly...
This is worse than being in a blizzard!
What? This soon!? This can't be real!
I might look like I'm wearing a lot, but it's a lot of thick layers.
Okay, I guess I'll take my gloves off first.
Things are going to heat up soon!
I'll take off my boots this time.
This jacket was meant for colder temperatures than this.
I've been looking forward to taking off this jacket. I was getting sweaty.
I'm feeling colder already.
Here go the pants. Please don't stare too much...
Please... Look away while I take my bra off. It's the polite thing to do.
I... I hope I can live up to your expectations.
Here they go... My panties...
Hmmph. I hate bullies.
It's for the best. My hands were getting warm.
There! Now I can feel the cards better.
Now I feel kind of short.
I feel so sole-less.
Although without it, I don't have much more left.
It's nice to get out of that big jacket. It was getting a little stuffy.
The cold never bothered me anyway.
It's not fat; it's protection against the cold!
This is starting to get a little embarrassing...
Don't look at me that way, or I'll have to wall you off!
Now that I'm down to my underwear, I'll have to play for real next round.
You could look somewhere else...
Normally they only get this perky when I am in my Cryo-Freeze...
I can't believe my breasts are out! This is so embarrassing!
I feel a strong breeze all of sudden...
It's freezing! I'm not used to being nude in the cold like this.
Please don't look...
I've never been this embarrassed in all of my life!
I don't shave down there often... I hope you don't mind...
I like having hair down there... It keeps me warm...
It wasn't me who lost!
Who lost?
Yay!
This should be getting interesting soon.
Don't be shy.
We'll chip away at your icy exterior.
哇！真好玩儿！
Is it okay if I think of you as more than a colleague?
If... if you like what you see, please take off something big...
Who has to take off more? Please tell me it was ~name~...
If... if you would like to pick something, ~name~.
Even if it's not much, would you mind taking something off, ~name~?
Sorry, but I was really hoping that it would be you who lost.
I know that this is obvious, but there's something so sexual about a man and woman undressing in front of each other...
I've given everything I can. It's your turn now!
I caught him!
你在帮我吗？
You're the most attractive one here, so don't be sad that we're happy that you lost, ~name~.
Now you look even better than before!
I'm really curious, Link... but are you an elf boy? Does anyone know if he understands English or Mandarin?
Luck is on my side so far.
You have to do better than that if you want to win!
C'mon, it's not that hard.
I didn't think I'd be this interested!
Don't postpone until next round what you could take off in this one.
I wasn't aiming for you, ~name~, so please don't take this personally.
I've lost enough already. It's some to see some more of you, ~name~!
Let's balance this out a little.
That was very kind of you.
Okay!
I'm interested!
哦! 哦! 我会密切关注！
If you'd please take off another piece of clothing, I can study the transfer of warmth through visual stimulus.
So far, so good!
哦，对不起啦。
I'm looking forward to seeing what you choose, ~name~.
If you don't mind, ~name~....
Whose turn is it to lose their shirt next?
I'm safe for now, but I have a feeling you'll be seeing these soon enough...
You're really attractive, ~name~. I'm looking forward to seeing what you choose to take off next.
Don't be shy. It's not as bad as you think it is.
There's no other way...
请，我想看看。
You haven't won yet! But you did beat me...
I never expected you to change phases so quickly, Moon...
Aimee's ready.
Oh, so you like to do it from behind too?
Oh, you don't have much left to choose from, Aimee!
You have one shot---one opportunity---to let it slip.
Thanks for taking one for the team, Hana!
Rise and shine, Dawn!
Time for the big D! Um, not that. I meant Dawn...
Evie, ice to meet you! Ha ha!
GoGo, I'm looking forward to seeing your lab! You're welcome to see mine anytime.
Hermione, was it? That's a very nice conductor's baton you have there!
I see that you also like to dress warmly, Jasmine!
Kim, nice to see you again! I'm guessing it was your birthday recently if you got permission to join a strip game!
Did you say that your name was Korra? You seem prepared for cold weather.
Leela, is it true that you used to work in the field of cryonics?
How do you float like that, Marceline? Could you show me the trick?
Time to make a splash, Misty!
It turns out that ice is effective against water after all!
Water you going to take off next? Haha!
Wow! I've never played this with someone so eager!
Wow, your arms are amazing! I wish I had an extra set of hands for when I'm the lab!
Let's not make Raven mad!
Revy, maybe you'd start playing better if you weren't so toxic.
Hello, Samus! I only know you by reputation, but I'd love to study your Ice Beam sometime!
Excuse me, Ms. Nine, but are you an astronaut? Maybe you've met my friend Winston at the Lunar Colony?
I'm sure there's a reasonable, scientific explanation for your being here, Spooky.
Nice to meet you, Twilight! Is it true that you and I both share a love of studying the Elements?
Velma, I love your glasses!
This should be a nice ice breaker!
Purple with a skull logo... You're not affiliated with Sombra the hacker, are you?!
Things are heating up as we deplete the o-ZONE layer!
Hana, don't you dare eat Snowball with your Defense Matrix again! I didn't pick these cards...
Do all people become ghosts or just some? Sometimes I wonder about my ancestors... and my friends...
You seem like a really nice girl, Nagisa. Maybe you should just go home and keep warm.
Oh, you don't have much left to choose from Aimee!
Oh, you don't have much left to choose from either, Aimee.
Oh, you don't have much left to choose from, Aimee! Neither do I...
当我们消耗臭氧层时，事情正在升温！
Korra, if you don't mind me asking, what's your cooldown on turning into a giant block of ice?
If you want to be the very best, you have to want it a little more!
You should have a little more self-respect, Moon!
You should try to win like the rest of us, Moon. Don't drop out right away.
It's nice to meet you, Revy. Is it true that you're half Chinese? I hope that we can be friends.
Sorry again... But you seem to be taking losing well!
I love your glasses, ~name~. So cute!
Oh, are you really a princess, ~name~? I'm sorry if we end up making you feel embarrassed...
Time to put your evil plans on ice!
Thanks for not making me go first!
Time to make a good first impression, ~name~!
Time for the second step.
Oh, sorry about that.
I knew I was going to be safe!
Are you prepared for this, ~name~?
Oops, sorry.
We might end up comparing more than our cards this game.
This is mostly a game of luck.
啊，抱歉了。
Great teamwork, everyone!
Okay.
It wasn't me!
I had a feeling it was going to be ~name~ next.
Hang in there.
Time to get chilly!
Sorry! Sorry, I'm sorry. Sorry.
So unlucky!
You're a lifesaver!
That felt a little too close!
Wow, that was a close one!
I think it's only fair that we all get naked before any of us have to go further...
如果你能分心大家的注意力，我将不胜感激！
哦，你想向我们展示什么？
Let's get you a little bit closer to the end of the game.
You're about to be one step nearer to where I am!
Is this a tie? How unlikely!
I've never seen anything like this before!
It's okay to take it slow. The game has barely started.
It'd be nice if you made it a bit more interesting next time.
We should've made some tighter rules...
I guess that's okay since I only had to take my gloves off.
You want to remove that?
Really? I was hoping for so much more.
I know what's next.
It seems like you're stalling.
This doesn't look like what I was hoping for.
Nothing to see here, move on.
Hey, no fair!
You're lucky you've still got that to take off!
I feel like I'm giving more than I'm getting back.
I've got my boobs out and you take that off?
I had a feeling you'd choose your ~clothing~...
I can't accept what you appear to be doing.
请不要下次这么残忍...
Chance really favored you today.
I have to say I'm disappointed I lost so quickly.
Haha, you're so funny, Mr. Chef!
~Name~, you would make the perfect research assistant.
~Name~, you are such a gentleman!
Ah, well, it's fun to play anyway!
Using deductive reasoning, I believe that you'll be taking off some more interesting items soon.
I loved your ~clothing~. Couldn't you have taken off something else?

Hypothesis: You won't take off anything interesting.
Conclusion: Sadly correct.
Slowly but surely...
Nothing to see here...
I hope that everyone can catch up to me soon...
I never could've predicted being this far behind.
Strip poker doesn't have to be only about boys checking out girls, you know!
Logically that was your best choice, though I would've picked something a bit more on the risque side.
Well, thanks for living up to your end of the deal... I guess.
How's it feel to still have all that on?
Please give me a chance! I'm so close to losing!
I'm going to dare to see you for what you could be!
当我手淫，我想看到好东西。
I should give you one of my frozen treats...
I hope the game goes on long enough to see more of the good stuff...
Your necklace and your earrings too? That's so generous of you, Weiss!

state.text: You should be a little more careful.

case.state: Controlling the weather? That's my field too! I'll have to show you my Endothermic Blaster later.
Wow, that's actually a really good strategy.
Nobody needs to teach you how to play, ~name~.
Let's all have a fun game.
I'm not surprised.
It's okay, you've still got a lot to take off!
If you don't know what to take off, we could make suggestions.
What's your plan for next round?
You have to let it go.
Hopefully this gets interesting soon.
I'm not hoping for much.
I wish we could speed it up a bit.
Hey, no fair!
I'm already this close to losing and you take off that little thing?
Sorry, but we had to win this one.
Well there's no helping it.
You're playing so well, ~name~...
How am I this bad at poker?
这就是全部？
Thank you for losing a hand. It makes me feel a little better about losing the whole game.
At least you won't be that far ahead of me.
It sure was worth it! We're one step closer to seeing the real you!
You must be feeling confident!
Do we both have four pieces to go, Hermione? I guess you could call this a tie!
I'm not surprised you went with something light, Dawn.
Angela, would you consider throwing this game... for a price?
This is like a game of Mystery Heroes. Maybe I should find the nearest cliff...
We can all be happy with this outcome.
You seem to have the hang of things.
If you were wondering, I'm not counting my glasses.
I didn't need to wear gloves today, but I brought them for the same reason you wore your ~clothing~!
In just ten minutes, we'll all be a lot less dressed.
Don't worry. You weren't going to hang on to that long anyway!
You won't have the advantage for much longer!
I like what you're wearing, ~name~. I just wish that you were a little worse at poker...
Now I understand why some people wear so much jewelry.
Your ~clothing~? That's cold.
Now the score's a little more even.
I wish I could freeze all of your clothes and then just shatter them off...
如果你这样做，我将无法长久的感觉良好...
Isn't that against regulations?
I'll do better next time!
If you save all season, you could get the ultimate replacement: golden ~clothing~!
So, Korra, you can control water using your body's energy? That doesn't seem very scientific.
What do you have for us, ~name~?
We're creeping closer to the big stuff.
What small sample do you have for us, ~name~?
Thumbs up to that win!
Are you... are you taking off your...
I'm having more fun than I ever did in Antarctica!
What do you have that's equal to my jacket?
What's your strategy this time?
Just think of me as a scientist here to observe the results.
I'm going to try twice as hard so that you have do that again!
I'm glad you're getting into the game, ~name~!
A-are you kidding? You still had that at the ready?
Well, at least I'm sort of back in it.
O-oh, come on! That's just rude!
Can you teach me some strategies after, ~name~?
请不要挑逗我.
I'm already done, and you're barely starting... this was a bad play on my part.
I thought you'd be closer by now.
Now we're getting closer to even.
Thanks!
I think we can all be happy with that!
Oh, that's what you were taking off! I thought it was something else!
Thank you.
Let's see if I have this equation correct: shirt(Mei) = ~clothing~(~name~)?
I think further observation is required.
Our hard work will be for nothing if you don't start losing now.
还没打完呢！
I'm so disappointed...
You're on thin ice, ~name~.
As long as we all get to see you naked at the end of the game, we'll be even.
我想看更多
You're a grandmaster at this game...
So much grinding for so little reward...
What were you aiming for this time?
Kicking things off with your boots?
Um, which of us do you think are foot fetishists, Zone-tan?
Haha, I agree, Kim! Let's get serious!
There's a little more than just feet on show right now!
It looks like ~name~ has picked her ~clothing~.
~Name~, why not take off your ~clothing~?
Off comes the ~clothing~!
I was only trying to help!
I'm looking forward to seeing what you pick.
Is it time to see a little bit more skin?
I'll make sure this won't happen next time!
I want to feel bad, but I only feel thankful...
Serves you right.
咦？ 你还穿着那件事吗？
Of all the- how are you so good at this game?
Were you Zone-tan's prisoner? Oh no! She didn't reprogram you to be a Talon agent, did she?
Those fighting moves you use seem tiring... I'd rather keep using my devices to manipulate water!
Sorry! I got nervous again that time.

state.text: That was close. You almost showed us a little more than you expected.

case.state: If you think it's cold here, you should try being assigned to the Antarctic!
You're too good at this! I started with more, but now we're even.
That was close! You almost caught up to me in a single shot!
Some of us have more than cold feet to worry about, Raven!
I'm sure you'll do better next hand!
It doesn't matter if we only made a little progress, as long as we're still ahead!
Hey, let's not feel bad. This is fun!
Well, that's something at least...
Are you teasing us, ~name~?
On the bright side for you, at least you didn't lose anything major.
I'm happy that I got to keep some modesty. At least for now...
I'm so embarrassed that I'm losing this badly. I wish I could cover my face, but then I'd be showing everything...
我有点失望...
That's abominable.
I'm a little disappointed...
For an experiment, good preparation is always necessary.
等等我！
Hey, wait for me!
My heart is already racing!
Let's see you get past this!
A gift for me?

state.text: Go on, take off your ~clothing~! Don't be afraid to get a little bit colder.

case.state: 哦，是的，继续这样做.
It seems you didn't come prepared.
Overcome all obstacles.
Just wait a little longer and I'll catch up.
At least it's not me this time.
有本事就过来。
You should visit me sometime at The Hanamura Inclement Climate Center!
You're amazing.
Looking good!
Your body is worth fighting for!
I just want to sneak up behind you and hug you until you can't move!
Well, color me impressed, ~name~!
啊! 你对我好!
Mmm, I might just play another round with you. One on one?
Now's my chance to make sure you aren't a wanted agent of Talon!
Oh!
I didn't think you'd go commando. Actually, I think Soldier: 76 is the only person I know who normally goes commando.
We're all girls here. Comparing underwear is part of the game. It'll be my turn soon.
We're all girls here. Comparing underwear is part of the game.
A bodysuit that leaves little to the imagination is the essence of discovery!

state.text: Remember that time Roadhog's hook just missed your body but ripped your suit off, Hana?

case.state: Did you need any help getting out of that?
最后！ 你的制服被删除！
Let's see Hanamura! Uh, I mean, more-o'-Hana!
I'm sorry, ~name~.
Wow, so close to being out already?
It's nothing personal.
What a development!
Victory is still within my grasp!
I could block you off with an Ice Wall until you're finished stripping, if you'd prefer.
It's okay, you look good either way!
Don't be worried. I'm in your corner!

state.text: Go on, take off your ~clothing~! Don't be afraid to get a little bit colder.

case.state: You didn't need your ~clothing~ anyways, did you?
Maybe you'd never take off your ~clothing~ on the train, but it's okay when you won't be the least dressed...
I might be able to clutch this one out!
哦，这是什么？

state.text: Sorry for suspecting you, Raven. I just had to make sure you weren't Reaper's younger sister.

case.state: That was amazing, Aimee!
Wow, cute bra, Dawn! I love the polka dots!
Ooh, you're so muscular! I've been meaning to work out a bit more... B-but I don't think I could handle your workout routine.
Wow, you have such piercing blue eyes beneath your mask, Marinette!

state.text: Wow! Cute bra, Dawn! I love the polka dots. I wish I'd worn something cuter, especially with ~player~ here...

case.state: Wow! Cute bra, Dawn! I love the polka dots. But don't think it's going to last long!
Wow! Cute bra, Dawn! I love the polka dots!
Wow, Hana! If you wanted to start in your underwear, you could have just said so!

state.text: I'm sorry, Angela, but we all really enjoyed that!

case.state: How do you keep such a slim figure, Samus? Is it all of the somersaulting?
Hana, I'm sorry! You always seemed so good at games...
I haven't seen you wear that style before, Hana. Not that I'm looking when we're in the locker room...
Wow, you took off the whole suit! You're so good at charging in, Hana!
Now it's starting to feel like the stakes are raised, like a real mission!
Now that you have your suit off, it feels like I'm winning again, Hana!
Sorry, Hana, but I had to even the score!
You're out of your suit and two steps from your birthday suit!
You've got a lot of catching up to do, Hana, but getting out of your suit was a great start!
宋哈娜... 不要挑逗我，我靠近边缘！ 请删除所有的衣服。
It's okay. Just pull yourself together and have another try at it!
I'm doing really well this game. This is a personal best for me!
You'd better watch your step.
Better watch out, Mei's going to get you!
Way to go!
Our attempts have exhibited wonderful results!
The quicker you lose everything, the quicker you can put it all back on again!
~Name~, you're so awesome! Just like Sun Wukong!
Good choice.
Nobody can complain about that.
Ouch! Are you okay?
You remind me a little of my friend Hana. She has a very nice figure too!
Sexy geometry!
Not bad!
I'm... I'm going to keep my thoughts to myself.
I, uh... Let's play the next hand!
I hope you learned your lesson.
~Name~, you're so amazing! You inspire me.
我们应该彼此拥抱，相互保持温暖。
You're doing great, ~name~! I hope you win!
You know... we should cuddle... for warmth...
Feel free to take it off at your own pace!
I... I confess that I get excited by seeing a nice chest...
Oh? Well, I wonder what you have...
I should take notes for next time. Study on why I did so well and the results.
I lost my shirt. You should lose yours too!
Be careful, ~name~. You don't want to be shirtless in cold climates.
Time for you to be topless too, ~name~
It's time for you to expose your chest.
哦，是时候看到你的胸部吗？ 是的，请！
With any luck, I'll see more, but let's get a look at that bare chest.
My heart is racing!
Oh my gosh! I thought you were a man! You... you are a man, right?
我的心是赛车！
天啊！ 我以为你是个男人 你是男人吗？
Oh my!
Oh, you shouldn't have!
Thumbs up to that!
My chest feels so tight...
冻住！不许走！
